blackboard.birt.extensions.dotbar.ui
Class DotbarFigureUI

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.extensions.ReportItemFigureProvider
      blackboard.birt.extensions.dotbar.ui.DotbarFigureUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.extensions.IReportItemFigureProvider
public class DotbarFigureUI
extends org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.extensions.ReportItemFigureProvider

Provides the dotbar figure. The dotbar figure is capable of rendering the dotbar in the designer using SWT. Specified in the org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.reportitemUI extension.

Author:
Steve Schafer / Innovent Solutions
